title: Entrepreneur Community Mentoring
description: Early entrepreneurs have difficulties communicating and developing a profitable business model for Catalyst proposals.

f6_assessments.q0: As they are trying to to atract developers and entrepreuners from other blockchains communities and other areas, the proposal is of course in the challenge
f6_assessments.q1: They have experience in the field and they already have started to build their social networks and a community around cardano, so they are easily implementing successfully the proposal
f6_assessments.q2: Easy to check the performance indicators added at the end of the proposal and success is defined. Following that is possible to audit the progress

solution: Attract entrepreneurs and developers with extensive experience and knowledge outside the blockchain world or even from other communities.
experience: Experience growing and engaging Discord and Twitch communities.Knowledge to generate visibility in social networks with political journalism
